T02D3219:223a-1: pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a sv'a dha nam /
T02D3219:223a-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3219:223a-4: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga'i rim pas yi ge aa
T02D3219:223a-5: las byung ba'i zla ba la yi ge hr'i: ser
T02D3219:223a-6: pos bskyed pa'i sna tshogs padma la yi ge ha:
T02D3219:223a-7: ser po yi ge aa la sogs pa dbyangs yig
T02D3219:223a-8: bcu drug gis yongs su bskor ba /
T02D3219:223a-9: phyi rol du ka la sogs pa brjod pa'i yi
T02D3219:223a-10: ge sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis yongs su bskor bar
T02D3219:223a-11: bya ba'o // de nas 'gying bag ma dang /
T02D3219:223a-18: dri ma zhes bya ba dang /
T02D3219:223a-20: de dag rnams thams cad yongs su gyur pa las
T02D3219:223a-21: ye shes kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin te 'od
T02D3219:223a-22: zer rab tu 'bar ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3219:223a-24: de'i steng du ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti'o //
T02D3219:223a-25: de'i steng du ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'o //
T02D3219:223a-26: de'i steng du ni po ti gnyis pa'o //
T02D3219:223a-27: de dag rnams thams cad kyang yongs su gyur pa
T02D3219:223a-28: las ni bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha
T02D3219:223a-29: rol tu phyin ma yin te /
T02D3219:223a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dbu rgyan la bzhugs pa /
T02D3219:223a-33: chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa /
T02D3219:223a-34: 'dab ma kha dog sna tshogs pa'i padma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
T02D3219:223a-35: rgyan thams cad dang na bza' dang ldan ma /
T02D3219:223a-36: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i glo gnyis na autpala bzhugs
T02D3219:223a-37: pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs
T02D3219:223a-39: aom a'a: hr'i: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3219:223a-40: yi ge h'um ser po dpral bar ro //
T02D3219:223a-41: yi ge a'a: dkar po mgul par ro //
T02D3219:223a-42: yi ge dh'i: ser po snying gar ro //
T02D3219:223a-43: yi ge h'um nag po lte bar yin te /
T02D3219:223a-44: bzlas pa'i dus su yi ge bzhi pa'o //
T02D3219:223a-45: rjes su bsam par bya ba'o bya ba yin no //
T02D3219:223b-0: gser gyi mdog gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @223b ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
